docs.text: Image Augumentations ¶ サンプル写真の表示 ¶ ライブラリのimport ¶ 1 2 3 4 5 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import albumentations as A import numpy as np import cv2 from PIL import Image Pillow とOpenCVそれぞれで画像を表示 ¶ === 'Pillow' 1 2 3 4 ```python img = Image.open(image_path) plt.imshow(img) ``` === 'OpenCV' 1 2 3 4 5 ```python image = cv2.imread(image_path) image = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB) plt.imshow(img) ``` C 1 2 3 4 5 6 #include <stdio.h> int main ( void ) { printf ( "Hello world! \n " ); return 0 ; } C++ 1 2 3 4 5 6 #include <iostream> int main ( void ) { std :: cout << "Hello world!" << std :: endl ; return 0 ; }
docs.title: image augmentations

docs.text: 1 2 3 4 5 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import albumentations as A import numpy as np import cv2 from PIL import Image
docs.title: ライブラリのimport

docs.text: === 'Pillow' 1 2 3 4 ```python img = Image.open(image_path) plt.imshow(img) ``` === 'OpenCV' 1 2 3 4 5 ```python image = cv2.imread(image_path) image = cv2.cvtColor(image, cv2.COLOR_BGR2RGB) plt.imshow(img) ``` C 1 2 3 4 5 6 #include <stdio.h> int main ( void ) { printf ( "Hello world! \n " ); return 0 ; } C++ 1 2 3 4 5 6 #include <iostream> int main ( void ) { std :: cout << "Hello world!" << std :: endl ; return 0 ; }
docs.title: Pillow とOpenCVそれぞれで画像を表示
